subject: Re: -tion and friends vs. -en and -on
msgSnippet: I don t think there are phonetic distinctions your California ears are not privy to, I think he s established a few standards for spelling affixes that serve
messageBody: I don't think there are phonetic distinctions your California ears are not privy to, I think he's established a few standards for spelling affixes that serve only for consistent spelling and possible disambiguation, but otherwise do seem arbitrary.  That certainly seems to be the case for "X" vs. "KS".  I simply never use the shortcut, and always spell out the "K" and "S", which connect easily together.
